4300700.name: Anidema Demo
4300700.description:
Anidema isn’t human. She’s a program that accidentally ended up on your desktop from a parallel operating system. She doesn't understand your world and learns by watching. Sometimes she imitates you. Sometimes she ignores you.

What happens:

  • Anidema moves around the screen on her own

  • Performs 10+ animations: walking, sitting at a laptop, having tea

  • Reacts to your presence

  • Unlock achievements by observing her behaviors and interacting in unexpected ways

What you can do:

  • Drag Anidema with your mouse to any spot on the screen

  • Change her size in the settings

  • Watch or interact - no goals, no timers

Features:

  • Windows only

  • No internet required

  • Minimalist interface

  • 2–2.5 hours of unhurried observation — no timers, no pressure

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
